title: Unable to enter valid derivation path due to error in UI
body: ### Description of Issue The MyCrypto UI won't accept a valid derivation path `m/44'/60'/0'/0/0` and shows an error: `Please enter a valid dpath`. ### What exactly were you doing when you encountered this issue? 1. Visit https://app.mycrypto.com/add-account/ledger_nano_s_new 1. Click on `add a custom derivation path` link 1. Add derivation path `m/44'/60'/0'/0/0` in the `New Derivation Path Credentials` text field (this is a valid derivation path because it was generated by [FindETH](https://findeth.io/) in the MyCrypto UI and appears in the downloaded `accounts.csv` file) 1. `Please enter a valid dpath` error message is displayed: ### How were you accessing your wallet? Ledger Nano S ### Description of Your Machine - Browser: `Chrome` - Browser version: `103.0.5060.134` - Operating system: `Mac OS Catalina 10.15.7` - Device: `Ledger Nano S` - MyCrypto.com: access using https://app.mycrypto.com/add-account/ledger_nano_s_new - MyCrypto Version Number: v.[457ec2f](https://github.com/MyCryptoHQ/MyCrypto/commit/457ec2f0a1cce537275c3b67d7e871f1ae3ae162)
